title: Notorious CAM XVID - STG
description:
Notorious 2009

Release Group: STG
Release Name: Notorious CAM XVID - STG
Release Date: January 21, 2009
Filename: NOTOR
Source: CAM
Size: 846 MB
Genre: Biography | Drama | Music
Video: 720 x 334 | 29.970fps
Audio: English | 128kbps | MP3
Subtitles: None
Runtime: 1hr 40mins
IMDB Rating: 5.7/10 (1,962 votes)
RT Critics: 5.8/10 (84 votes)
Directed By: George Tillman Jr.
Starring: Jamal Woolard, Anthony Mackie, Derek Luke, Angela Bassett

The life and death story of Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

NOTES:
Right this is a mixture of versions to bring to you a complete version with full audio :)
The .iso i got was pretty good and had better colouring/contrast then the lynks version.....however it was heavily cropped,so 
i opted for the lynks version for the main bulk of the film.....Which i might add was another top release by them ;-)
Anyway quality wise......the picture on both sources were great for cams.....don't get much better then these (well not nowadays anyway).
The audio was good on both,but both cams the .iso probably had slightly better audio...but there was too much in it and not enough to 
warrant a re-sync.

WORK DONE:
The important thing was to split the ending off the .iso and add it to lynks release......
After this i notice a small glitch around the 28 min mark on lynks version (well on my download anyway)....so i needed to use another programme 
aswell for this ...my xpress wouldn't have it :(
Once sorted i slightly tweaked the colours,contrast etc......not to much though as it was good anyway.
Oh also used a contour filter to sharpen the picture up a touch  more aswell
